resources.string: \t The creators of this game are Sodium. For more information about this app, check out this resource: CMPT276 \n

\t This app provides achievement goals to turn some competitive board games into a more co-operative experience. \n \t At the end of a game, the combined score of all players is used to calculate a combined achievement level, with a higher total score earning a better achievement.

Goofy Goblins 					 Majestic Unicorns 

Majestic Unicorns 		 Fabulous Dragons 

Fabulous Dragons 		 Brilliant Pixies 

Fabulous Dragons 		 Brilliant Pixies
